name: XRInputSourceArray.forEach
description: The XRInputSourceArray method forEach() executes the specified callback once for each input source in the array, starting at index 0 and progressing until the end of the list.
content:
Secure context
This feature is available only in secure contexts (HTTPS), in some or all supporting browsers.

The XRInputSourceArray methodforEach()executes the specified callback once for each input source in the array, starting at index 0 and progressing until the end of the list.
